body:
As i said in Avicus Staff slack:

Thanks for everything guys. It's been a great time moderating with you guys, but I feel like I'm taking a spot in the team which is being wasted. I don't have the time to moderate and do everything that I'd like to do. It's been a pleasure to serve with you, but who knows, if my PC time get's extended i may be back sooner than you think :simple_sm

I also feel like my moderating wasn't appreciated by everyone, which is what i wanted to achieve. You can't please everyone, i know, but i want to feel like i can. Thanks to the moderating team, they deserve a big round of applause, and more respect than you receive. You guys are like Apollo: a family.

See you around, Raging <3
body_tagged:
